projects.title: My Personal Website
projects.description: This website is in construction - please excuse the mess! In the meantime, enjoy this night shot of Chicago that I took.

image.alt: Night view of Lake Shore Drive in Chicago

projects.title: Automatic Plant Watering System
projects.description: I do love having plants in my apartment - but I also always forget to water them (which is bad). That's why I'm putting up an automated system to do that for me.

image.alt: Plants at the Garfield Park Conservatory of Chicago
